message: I can haz one?
I've spent a little time building one, but it's far, far from finished.  Working on making the website experience awesome before focusing on Android.
Understood.
hey! I vote for this one! As an exercise I started writing one too =) I can already log in and read the group list =)
-1 webapp ftw
Just do an mobile HTML5 interface then wrap webkit around it
@ericflo based on the interest of others, you could release yours and start and open source effort to create apps.

I'd rather see a nice HTML5 interface by Convore Inc and have the apps done by someone else (shouldn't be that hard using the API). So +1 for HTML5 rather than an official Android app from Convore Inc.
@d0ugal Good call. Make it Open Source and have more than 1 work on it.
@ericmoritz I agree..
I started working on one and got some views (groups/topics/messages) working. Think i will release a first alpha in a week or two.
Would be fantastic to have an android/iphone app.
Just added my name into the hat :)

We are _almost_ ready to beta test our Android app.  It'd dubbed Conk, and we have one release blocking bug.  Please let me know if you're interested in seeing it pre-public release and I'll see what I can do http://eepurl.com/cOwIc
I said I wouldn't show a screencap to my other devs, but I lied, mostly because I hope it gets people to sign up for my announce list :) http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1528/conk-preview2.png
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1528/conk-preview.png

now i feel the sudden urge to post sth too. i'm too lazy to make screencaps, so here goes: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5043669/convorsation.apk
consider this a pre-alpha, so crashes _will_ happen.
these are the features implemented so far:
- list groups
- list topics
- list messages
- post topic
- post message
- live updates
- notifications

please don't be to hard on me, this is my first android "release"

app-related group:
https://convore.com/convorsation/
convorsation barcode: http://i.imgur.com/WJOQ7.png
Last Plug for conk, as I'm trying to move all discussion here: https://convore.com/conk-a-convore-mobile-client/
added green dots to highlight online users when viewing a topic
@ericflo thx! and of course. feedback is always welcome.
@EisFrei OK your app is *awesome*
@EisFrei I'm a fan!  Do you want feedback yet?
New convorsation apk for those that need it: http://i.imgur.com/zEPQN.png
